data.name: SessionIdRequired
data.value: Session ID cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when session ID is missing

data.name: SessionNotFound
data.comment: Error message when session cannot be found. {0} is the session ID

data.name: SessionAlreadyExists
data.comment: Error when trying to create duplicate session

data.name: OperationIdRequired
data.value: Operation ID cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when operation ID is missing

data.name: OperationNotFound
data.comment: Error message when operation cannot be found

data.name: DocumentIdRequired
data.value: Document ID cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when document ID is missing

data.name: DocumentNotFound
data.comment: Error message when document cannot be found

data.name: DocumentTypeRequired
data.comment: Validation message when document type is missing

data.name: ImageIdRequired
data.value: Image ID cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when image ID is missing

data.name: ImageDataRequired
data.value: Image data cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when image data is missing

data.name: FieldNameRequired
data.value: Field name cannot be null or empty
data.comment: Validation message when field name is missing

data.name: FieldValueInvalid
data.comment: Validation error for field value. {0} is field name, {1} is the invalid value

data.name: StorageInitializationFailed
data.comment: Error during storage initialization. {0} is the error details

data.name: StorageOperationFailed
data.comment: Generic storage operation failure. {0} is operation name, {1} is error

data.name: OCRProcessingFailed
data.comment: OCR processing error. {0} is document ID, {1} is error message

data.name: OCRServiceUnavailable
data.comment: Message when OCR service cannot be reached

data.name: CameraPermissionDenied
data.value: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera access
data.comment: Message when camera permission is not granted

data.name: CameraInitializationFailed
data.comment: Camera initialization error. {0} is error details

data.name: CameraNotAvailable
data.comment: Message when no camera is detected
